text: @dcexaminer @brianstelter @GenFlynn Hannity spent more than half is “show” on Flynn, Mueller, and-get this-FISA abuse on Friday. I didn’t hear the words Coronavirus or deaths or unemployment at all. Now, keep in mind, I only tune in at commercials on the real news channels, and only to laugh at the ignorance.
